alert.note: Alert for Coryell; McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 8:58PM CDT until June 16 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern McLennan County in central Texas... Northeastern Coryell County in central Texas... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 858 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gatesville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waco, Gatesville, Hewitt, Woodway, McGregor, Lorena, Crawford, Lake Waco, Fort Gates, Oglesby, South Mountain, Osage, Coryell City, Willow Grove and Spring Valley. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 322 and 324. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
